summary: This bill, titled the "Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg Congressional Gold Medal Act," proposes awarding a Congressional Gold Medal to Jens Stoltenberg. It recognizes his leadership and service as the Secretary General of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO). The findings credit him with strengthening the alliance's collective defense, increasing defense spending commitments among members, overseeing the accession of new countries like Finland and Sweden, and maintaining unprecedented unity in response to Russia's 2022 invasion of Ukraine. The medal honors his contributions to the security and unity of the NATO Alliance.
